.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TcpServerChannel extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiver, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ISecurableChannel

summary.span: 为远程调用实现使用 TCP 协议传输消息的服务器信道。

span.span: Implements a server channel for remote calls that uses the TCP protocol to transmit messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-class-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-class-note.md)] 通道传输跨远程处理边界的消息 (例如，计算机或应用程序域) 。Channels transport messages across remoting boundaries (for example, computers or application domains). 类使用 TCP 协议传输消息。The class transports messages using the TCP protocol. 通道由 .NET Framework 远程处理基础结构用于传输远程调用。Channels are used by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls. 当客户端调用远程对象时，调用将被序列化为客户端通道发送并由服务器通道接收的消息。When a client makes a call to a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel. 然后对其进行反序列化和处理。It is then deserialized and processed. 任何返回值由服务器通道传输并由客户端通道接收。Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel. 若要在服务器端执行额外的消息处理，可以指定接口的实现， 通过该接口，通过该接口来传递该实例处理的所有消息 。To perform additional processing of messages on the server side, you can specify an implementation of the interface through which all messages processed by the instance are passed. 实例接受以二进制或 SOAP 格式序列化的消息。The instance accepts messages serialized in either binary or SOAP format. 对象具有关联的配置属性，这些属性可在运行时在配置文件中设置 (方法是：调用静态 方法) 或通过将集合传递 到 构造函数) 以编程方式 (。A object has associated configuration properties that can be set at run time either in a configuration file (by invoking the static method) or programmatically (by passing a collection to the constructor). 有关这些配置属性的列表，请参阅 [通道和格式化程序配置属性](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100))。For a list of these configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100)). > [!NOTE] > 如果服务器计算机运行的是 Windows 95/98/Me，则 不能将指定为安全的。If the server computer is running Windows 95/98/Me, the cannot be specified as secure. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用可远程处理的类型。The following code example shows the use of a remotable type. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpInfo#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CPP/remotable.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpInfo#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CS/remotable.cs#10)] 下面的代码示例演示 如何使用类公开可远程处理的类型。The following code example shows the use of the class to expose a remotable type. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpInfo#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CPP/server.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpInfo#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CS/server.cs#30)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关通道配置属性的详细信息，请参阅 [通道和格式化程序配置属性](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100))。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100)). > [!NOTE] > 如果服务器计算机运行的是 Windows 95/98/Me，则 不能将指定为安全的。If the server computer is running Windows 95/98/Me, the cannot be specified as secure. 如果不需要接收器功能，请将参数设置 `sinkProvider` 为 `null` 。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数创建 具有特定配置属性的对象。The following code example shows the use of this constructor to create a object with specific configuration properties. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpAuth#21](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpAuth/CPP/server.cpp#21)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpAuth#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpAuth/CS/server.cs#21)]

summary.span: 使用给定名称初始化 类的新实例，该实例侦听指定的端口。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数 使用参数设置属性 `name` 。This constructor sets the property by using the `name` parameter. 如果要注册多个通道，则每个通道都必须具有唯一的名称。If you want to register more than one channel, each channel must have a unique name. 若要请求动态分配可用端口，请将参数设置 `port` 为 0 (零) 。To request that an available port be dynamically assigned, set the `port` parameter to 0 (zero). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造 。The following code example shows how to construct a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数 使用参数设置属性 `name` 。This constructor sets the property by using the `name` parameter. 如果要注册多个通道，则每个通道都必须具有唯一的名称。If you want to register more than one channel, each channel must have a unique name. 若要请求动态分配可用端口，请将参数设置 `port` 为 0 (零) 。To request that an available port be dynamically assigned, set the `port` parameter to 0 (zero). 如果不需要接收器功能，请将参数设置 `sinkProvider` 为 `null` 。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造 。The following code example shows how to construct a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管作为的实例返回 ，但可以将此属性的值强制转换为 说明对象所侦听的通道的实例 。Although returned as an instance of , the value of this property can be cast to an instance of describing the channel to which the object listens. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example shows the use of this property. span.span: A instance that contains the name of the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个已注册的通道都具有唯一的名称。Every registered channel has a unique name. 此名称用于在调用时检索特定通道 。The name is used to retrieve a specific channel when calling . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example shows the use of this property. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpInfo#32](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CPP/server.cpp#32)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpInfo#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CS/server.cs#32)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChannelPriority As Integer
public: property int ChannelPriority { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前信道的优先级。

span.span: Gets the priority of the current channel.

value.span: 一个整数，表示分配给该信道的优先级。

span.span: An integer that represents the priority assigned to the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 优先级控制通道数据在实例中的显示顺序 ; 较高优先级的通道显示在低优先级通道之前。The priority controls the order in which channel data appears in a instance; higher priority channels appear before lower priority channels. 客户端会按照实例中列出的顺序尝试连接到服务器通道 。Clients try to connect to the server channels in the order that they are listed in the instance. 默认优先级为 1;允许负的优先级。The default priority is 1; negative priorities are allowed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example shows the use of this property. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpInfo#32](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CPP/server.cpp#32)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpInfo#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CS/server.cs#32)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StartListening(object data) cil managed
abstract member StartListening : obj -> unit override this.StartListening : obj -> unit

span.span: Optional initialization information.

summary.span: 在调用 方法停止侦听通道后，指示当前通道开始侦听通道。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to start listening on a channel after the method has been called to stop listening on the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数会自动调用 `StartListening` ，因此除非之前调用过，否则不应调用此方法 。The constructor automatically calls `StartListening`, so you shouldn't call this method unless was previously called. `StartListening`在已侦听的通道上调用可能会导致意外的行为，应避免此问题。Calling `StartListening` on an already listening channel may lead to unexpected behaviors and should be avoided. 如果频道使用动态分配的端口号，则在重新启动侦听时，端口号可能会改变。If your channel uses a dynamically assigned port number, your port number might change when you restart listening. 数据对象可用于向通道传递特定的初始化状态。The data object can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel. 如果你不希望将特定状态传递到通道，请将设置 `data` 为 `null` 。If you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel, set `data` to `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StopListening(object data) cil managed
abstract member StopListening : obj -> unit override this.StopListening : obj -> unit

param.name: data
param.span: 该信道的可选状态信息。

span.span: Optional state information for the channel.

summary.span: 指示当前信道停止侦听请求。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to stop listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法停止在通道上进行侦听。Use this method to stop listening on a channel. 若要重新启动侦听，请使用 方法。To restart listening, use the method. 如果频道使用动态分配的端口号，则在重新启动侦听时，端口号可能会改变。If your channel uses a dynamically assigned port number, your port number might change when you restart listening. 数据对象可用于向通道传递特定的初始化状态。The data object can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel. 如果你不希望将特定状态传递到通道，请将设置 `data` 为 `null` 。If you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel, set `data` to `null`.
